Articles.Content: i was going to go to mun in spaceprobe for science but u guy remove it!!! now i cant go to tha mun how do i get data for new part!!

Are you in career mode ? If yes then some probes are not "advanced" enough to place manoeuvre node (like low-leveled pilots). You may also have to upgrade the tracking station to unlock patched conics (I think this should unlock nodes in career mode).

I moved this to a more appropriate forum.

Gaarst is correct. It took me by surprise too when I saw that ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

> 
> I moved this to a more appropriate forum.
> Gaarst is correct. It took me by surprise too when I saw that ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Low level pilots (and therefore all non-pilots) cant place maneuver nodes???

I thought you jsut have to unlock them by upgrading tracking station?

Hayhaa: i managed to flyby the Mun without maneuver nodes or patched conics. I just guessed how far out i needed to be, and it worked well enough...
I think the "correct" part is the upgrade tracking station part - pilot levels are not related.
